name: overtone
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ usually plural ] something that is suggested, but is not clearly stated: The concert was supposed to be a charity event but it had strong political overtones. There was an overtone of regret in his farewell speech.

physics, music
  specialized a frequency of a sound that is higher than the fundamental (= the lowest normal frequency)

Add to word list
a quality, attitude, or emotion that is suggested in addition to what is stated: His music has been called R&B with jazz overtones.
